content: - 18 -   Swanson, Eric T. (2017).  “Measuring the Effects of Federal Reserve Forward Guidance  and Asset Purchases on Financial Markets,” NBER Working Paper Series 23311.   Cambridge, Mass.:  National Bureau of Economic Research, April (revised  August 2018).   -------- (2018).  “The Federal Reserve Is Not Very Constrained by the Lower Bound on  Nominal Interest Rates,” NBER Working Paper Series 25123.  Cambridge, Mass.:   National Bureau of Economic Research, October.   Weingarden, Alison (2017).  “Labor Market Outcomes in Metropolitan and Non- Metropolitan Areas:  Signs of Growing Disparities,” FEDS Notes.  Washington:   Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, September 25,  https://www.federalreserve.gov/econres/notes/feds-notes/labor-market-outcomes- in-metropolitan-and-non-metropolitan-areas-signs-of-growing-disparities- 20170925.htm.    Woodford, Michael (2012).  “Methods of Policy Accommodation at the Interest-Rate  Lower Bound,” paper presented at “The Changing Policy Landscape,” a  symposium sponsored by the Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City, held in  Jackson Hole, Wyo., August 30-September 1,  https://www.kansascityfed.org/publicat/sympos/2012/Woodford_final.pdf.   Yellen, Janet (2015).  “Inflation Dynamics and Monetary Policy,” speech delivered at the  Philip Gamble Memorial Lecture, University of Massachusetts, Amherst,  September 24,  https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/speech/yellen20150924a.htm.   -------- (2017).  “The Economic Outlook and the Conduct of Monetary Policy,” speech  delivered at the Stanford Institute for Economic Policy Research, Stanford  University, Stanford, Calif., January 19,  https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/speech/yellen20170119a.htm.
